turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey can you order me a pizza from Domino's?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah of course which location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one by Micky's diner

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I have it pulled up what would you like

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have any good deals that have 2 pizzas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes they have a deal with 2 medium 2 topping for 5.95 a piece

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great lets do that one

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay what type of crust do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hand tosses

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of toppings on the first pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want black olives and sausage

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type would you like for the other one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want canadian bacon and pinneapple

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great! would you like to donate a dollar to st jude?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah that would be fine

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes a sprite please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What is the total?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 15$ your pizza order is complete and the pizzas will be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes.
